headline: EPAM Wins the 2025 Microsoft Innovate with Azure AI Platform Partner of the Year Award
summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM) today announced it has won the Innovate with Azure AI Platform 2025 Microsoft Partner of the Year Award. The Company was honored among a global field of top Microsoft partners for demonstrating excellence in the innovation and implementation of customer solutions based on Microsoft technology.
